授業目的:
This course will teach students how to have good academic discussions and basic presentation research skills.

This course is divided into two parts:
1. Discussions - During class you will discuss topics with your classmates and practice academic discussion skills.
Students will prepare and discuss four topics in a small group using the discussion skills presented and practiced in class.

2. Internet Research Presentations - Students will prepare and present two Internet Researches. This will give you the basic skills to confidently give a short English presentation to a small group of people.
